title: Big Dustbin
description: A big dustbin is a large container used for the storage and disposal of waste. These bins are typically made from durable materials such as plastic or metal, and are designed to withstand heavy use in both indoor and outdoor environments.

title: Carry Basket
description: A carry basket is a portable container designed to be transported by hand. It is typically made of woven or plaited materials such as wicker, rattan, or bamboo and is used for carrying items such as groceries, laundry, or personal belongings.

title: Cleaning Kit
description: An industrial cleaning kit is a collection of tools and supplies designed for the efficient and effective cleaning of heavy-duty equipment and machinery. These kits typically include a variety of brushes, sprays, solvents, and other specialized items for removing dirt, grime, and other contaminants from surfaces. They are commonly used in manufacturing plants, workshops, and other industrial settings where equipment needs to be kept in top condition.

title: Dry Mop
description: A dry mop is a type of mop used in industrial settings to clean floors and other surfaces without the use of water or cleaning solutions. It is typically made of absorbent materials such as microfiber, cotton, or synthetic fibers, and is designed to pick up and trap dust, debris, and other particulates.

title: Diffuser Machine
description: A diffuser machine is a device used to disperse and distribute a substance, such as a fragrance, essential oil, or mist, into the air. It works by using air or ultrasonic waves to create tiny droplets that are then spread throughout a space. Diffuser machines can be used for a variety of purposes, including aromatherapy, air freshening, and humidification. There are several types of diffuser machines available, including ultrasonic, nebulizing, and heat-based diffusers.

title: Diffuser Oil
description: Diffuser oil, also known as essential oil, is a concentrated liquid that is used in diffuser machines to disperse the scent of natural oils into the air. These oils are derived from plants and are known for their therapeutic and aromatherapy benefits. They come in a wide range of scents, including floral, herbaceous, citrus, and woodsy, and can be used to create a calming, relaxing, or invigorating atmosphere.

title: Toilet Brush
description: A toilet brush is a cleaning tool used for scrubbing the inside of a toilet bowl. It typically consists of a long handle with a round, bristled brush head attached to one end. The brush head is used to scrub the sides and bottom of the toilet bowl, removing dirt, grime, and other build-up to keep the toilet clean and hygienic.

title: Sodium Hypochlorite
description: Sodium Hypochlorite is a bleach or disinfectant, and is capable of killing pathogens like bacteria, viruses, fungi and mycobacterium. It can be used as a household cleaner, thanks to its destaining properties, and may also be an ingredient in laundry detergents and deodorizing products.

title: Dust Pan
description: Keeping home clean & hygienic is an everyday necessity. A healthy & hygienic surrounding helps maintaining good personal heath. All our products are designed & manufactured with long term durability in mind.

title: Wet Mop
description: Keeping home clean & hygienic is an everyday necessity. A healthy & hygienic surrounding helps maintaining good personal heath. our aim is to make home cleaning less like chore & more convenient these impeccably designed easy to use & easy to maintain products range from toilet brushes, sink brushes, broom brushes, tile brushes, cob web brushes, dust pans, bathroom wipers, kitchen wipers to sponge wipes & utensils scrubs. All our products are designed & manufactured with long term durability in mind.

title: Industrial Mat
description: Industrial mats are essential components in various industrial settings, providing safety, comfort, and durability. They serve as floor covering materials in areas where workers spend a lot of time standing, such as manufacturing facilities, warehouses, and workshops.

title: Wet Mop
description: Wet floor mop set is perfect for commercial and home floor cleaning jobs. And it includes a good quality head with looped ends for optimal absorption without fraying.

title: Wringer Trolley
description: Easy to mop and squeeze dirty water without getting your hands wet or dirty. Light weight and easy to maneuver thanks to 4 castor wheels.

title: Urinal Screen
description: Wide range of Urinal Screen with strong & Mild Fragrances.

title: Swimming Pool Ladder
description: This pool ladder is made by high quality stainless material which could let this item would not stain in the swimming pool and would not pollute the water in the swimming pool, durable for years.

title: TCCA Granules
description: Used in the swimming pool for cleaning purpose.

title: Swimming Pool Hose
description: The vacuum hose for swimming pools is made to withstand strong pump suction without collapsing, twisting, or straining. The heavy-duty hose, which is composed of heavier weight material and is guaranteed not to collapse even under demanding operating conditions and maximum suction and rigorous operating conditions.

title: Swimming Pool Cleaning Brush
description: Pool brush for clearing any pools of dirt and algae, hot tub and spa surfaces. Durable all-weather materials withstand high temperatures. Curved brush design is perfect for cleaning pool walls, pool floors or any pool surface.

title: Swimming Net
description: Swimming Net used to clean swimming pools. Utilize the skimmer deep bag, which has a large capacity and a fine mesh for capturing small waste like pine cones and small twigs as well as trapping floating trash and even the smallest insects.

title: Swimming Pool TCCA Tablets / Drum
description: Contains 90% chlorine in a high concentration in a stable, soluble form. Powerful biofilm and algae cleanser. Designed for all types of swimming pools. Destroys microorganisms and keeps water clean.

title: Toilet Cleaner
description: DOCTOR SHINE is an advance formulations for cleaning all types of toilet. It removes all tough stain & Kills more than 99% germs.

title: Floor Wiper
description: Helps instantly dry floors with single swipe clean. Wiper comes with a Stainless Steel long pipe. Sharp rubber edge for instant cleaning

title: Ladder
description: Helps instantly dry floors with single swipe clean. Wiper comes with a Stainless Steel long pipe. Sharp rubber edge for instant cleaning

title: Liquid Detergent
description: For tough stains, pre-soaking in detergent soultion.

title: Multisurface Floor Cleaner
description: A hygenic home cleaner having powerful formula which dislodg dirt and stains completely, cleaning prevents the gems leaving behind pleasant floral fragrance.

title: Liquid Dishwash
description: It gives shine to utensils. Neutralises odour. Removes tough oil and grease.

title: White Phenyl
description: A hygienic home cleaner having powerful formula which dislodge dirt and stains completely, cleaning prevents the gems leaving behind Fresh Pine fragrance. Keep mosquitos, files and ants away.

title: Alphox 200
description: Alphox 200 is an ethylene oxide condensate of alkyl phenol. It is a pale coloured liquid soluble in water, vegetable oil, alcohol, Glycol ethers, chloroform but insoluble in mineral oil and kerosene. The product is made in the plant with the fully automated DCS system which ensures consistent quality of Alphox 200.

title: CAPB Liquid
description: This product is widely used in shampoo, bath liquid, liquid soap and household detergents, thanks to the warm performance become good preparation baby shampoo, bubble bath, and the main components of the skin care products.In the skin and hair care formula is a kind of excellent softening conditioner, also can be used as a wetting agent, thickening agent, antistatic agent, fungicide and soft treatment agent in textile dyeing and printing industry etc.

title: CDEA Chemical
description: COCODIETHANOLAMIDE (CDEA) World Chem Industries is formulating Coco Diethanolamide (CDEA) by the reaction of fatty acids mixture acquired from coconut oils, with diethanolamine. The common applications of this product is in bath products such as hand soaps and shampoos (as foaming agent); and in cosmetics (as emulsifying agent).

title: CMEA Chemical
description: Cocomono ethanol amide (CMEA) is a non ionic surfactant. It is used in personal care products like shampoos as a foam boosting agent. It also acts as a good viscosity builder in skin and hair care products.

title: Glycerine
description: Glycerin is a simple polyol (sugar alcohol) compound. It is a colorless, odorless, viscous liquid that is widely used in pharmaceutical formulations. Glycerol has three hydroxyl groups that are responsible for its solubility in water and its hygroscopic nature. The glycerol backbone is central to all lipids known as triglycerides. Glycerol is sweet-tasting and generally considered non-toxic.

title: LABSA
description: Linear alkyl benzene sulphonic acid, also known as LABSA is a synthetic chemical surfactant, which is a widely used industrial detergent. It is used in washing powder, detergent powder, oil soap, cleaning powder and detergent cake.

title: Pine Oil
description: Pine oil is a colorless to pale yellow essential oil. Depending on its source, pine oil may either have a fresh, earthy, and forest-like fragrance or a strong, dry, balsamic, turpentine-like odor. alkyl benzene sulphonic acid, also known as LABSA is a synthetic chemical surfactant, which is a widely used industrial detergent. It is used in washing powder, detergent powder, oil soap, cleaning powder and detergent cake.

title: Polysorbate
description: Polysorbate 80 is derived from polyethoxylated sorbitan and oleic acid. The hydrophilic groups in this compound are polyethers also known as polyoxyethylene groups, which are polymers of ethylene oxide.

title: SLES Liquid
description: SLES is prepared by ethoxylation of dodecyl alcohol. The resulting ethoxylate is converted to a half ester of sulfuric acid, which is then neutralized by conversion to the sodium salt.

title: Liquid Sorbitan Monooleate
description: We provide sorbitol monooleate emmulsifier for Explosives, Cosmatics, lubricants and food industries. These products are highly acclaimed for their properties like purity, high effectiveness, longer shelf life, glossy finish and accurate composition.

title: Turkey Red Oil
description: Turkey Red Oil is also known as Sulfated Castor Oil. It is the only oil that will completely disperse in water. The oil is expressed from the seed. Sulfated castor oil is created by adding sulfuric acid to castor oil, and is considered the first synthetic detergent. Turkey Red Oil has a distinct and heavy scent. It is a surfactant and therefore makes a wonderful base for a bath oil as it mixes well with water, producing a milk bath.

title: Air Freshner
description: We introduce a wide range of Air fresheners. Has wide range of fragrances to create a new & pleasant aroma in your surroundings. This air freshener which emits fragrance on spraying. Primary used for odour elimination. The result is odour-free air that is also pollution-free and safer to breathe.

title: Glass Cleaner
description: Glass Cleaner removes dirt and dust. It can be used across glass and shiny surfaces, such as tabletops, mirrors, glass windows, fridge, oven, kitchen cabinets, furniture, car windows etc

title: Fabric Softner
description: Fabric Cleaner softens, freshens, and protects your clothes from stretching, fading, and fuzz leaving them with a long-lasting Febreze-fresh floral scent you'll want to keep on sniffing. This conditioning fabric softener fights static and reduces more wrinkles than using detergent alone in the wash.
